onChange.script:
self.custom.reset = False
	if currentValue.value == True:
		rowData = self.params.rowData
		checkInDate = self.params.rowData['checkInDate']
		checkOutDate = self.params.rowData['checkOutDate']
		if checkInDate != None and checkInDate != '':
			checkInDate = system.date.fromMillis(checkInDate)
	#		checkInDate = system.date.format(checkInDate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.S')
		else:
			checkInDate = checkInDate
		if checkOutDate != None and checkOutDate != '':
			checkOutDate = system.date.fromMillis(checkOutDate)
	#		checkOutDate = system.date.format(checkOutDate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.S')
		else:
			checkOutDate = checkOutDate
		
		self.custom.editData = {
							  "age": self.params.rowData['age'],
							  "bed": self.params.rowData['bed'],
							  "checkInDate": checkInDate,
							  "checkOutDate": checkOutDate,
							  "exitdestination": self.params.rowData['exitdestination'],
							  "gender": self.params.rowData['gender'],
							  "participantName": self.params.rowData['participantName'],
							  "programName": self.params.rowData['programName'],
							  "programId": self.params.rowData['programId'],
							  "room": self.params.rowData['room'],
							  "shelter": self.params.rowData['shelter'],
							  "bedLogId": self.params.rowData['bedLogId'],
							  "exitDestinationId": self.params.rowData['exitDestinationId']
							}

config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		bedLogId = self.view.params.rowData.bedLogId
		eventStart = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.checkInDate
		eventEnd = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.checkOutDate
		ExitDestinationId = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.exitDestinationId
		ExitDestinationId = ExitDestinationId if ExitDestinationId != -1 else None
		programId = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.programId
		system.perspective.print(eventStart)
		system.perspective.print(eventEnd)
		# if eventStart not null/empty then format date
		if eventStart != None and eventStart != '':
			eventStart = system.date.parse(eventStart,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S')
			eventStart = system.date.format(eventStart,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
		else:
			eventStart = None
		# if eventEnd not null/empty then format date
		if eventEnd != None and eventEnd != '':
			eventEnd = system.date.parse(eventEnd,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S')
			eventEnd = system.date.format(eventEnd,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
		else:
			eventEnd = None
		
		system.perspective.print(eventStart)
		system.perspective.print(eventEnd)
#		# check check-out date can not be prior to check-in date
#		selectQ = "SELECT * FROM lodging.bedLog where id = ? and eventStart < ?"
#		CompareCheckoutDate = system.db.runPrepQuery(selectQ, [bedLogId,eventEnd])
#		# check check-in date must be prior to check-out date
#		selectQ = "SELECT * FROM lodging.bedLog where id = ? and eventEnd > ?"
#		CompareCheckinDate = system.db.runPrepQuery(selectQ, [bedLogId,eventStart])
		#if (CompareCheckoutDate.getRowCount()>0 and CompareCheckinDate.getRowCount()>0) or eventEnd == None:	
		## check if any participant with same bed checkIn for same date range
		query = '''
				SELECT * FROM lodging.bedLog where (
				(eventStart between ? and ?) or (eventEnd between ? and ?)
				or (? between eventStart and eventEnd) or (? between eventStart and eventEnd)
				)
				and bedId = (SELECT bedId FROM lodging.bedLog where id = ?)
				and id != ?
				'''
		multiParticipant_sameDate = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[eventStart,eventEnd,eventStart,eventEnd,eventStart,eventEnd,bedLogId,bedLogId], "RITIOps")	
		## check if same participant with different bed checkIn same date range
		query = '''
				SELECT * FROM lodging.bedLog where (
				(eventStart between ? and ?) or (eventEnd between ? and ?)
				or (? between eventStart and eventEnd) or (? between eventStart and eventEnd)
				)
				and participantId = (SELECT participantId FROM lodging.bedLog where id = ?)
				and id != ?
				'''
		sameParticipant_multiDate = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[eventStart,eventEnd,eventStart,eventEnd,eventStart,eventEnd,bedLogId,bedLogId], "RITIOps")	
		compareDate = False
		if eventEnd != None:
			compareDate = system.date.isBefore(system.date.parse(eventStart,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'), system.date.parse(eventEnd,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'))
		if compareDate == True or eventEnd == None:	
			if multiParticipant_sameDate.getRowCount() < 1:		
				if sameParticipant_multiDate.getRowCount() < 1:				
					path = "Settings/BedLog/UpdateBedLogEntry"
					parameters = {"eventStart":eventStart,
								"eventEnd":eventEnd,
								"bedLogId":bedLogId,
								"exitDestinationId":ExitDestinationId,
								}
					system.perspective.print(parameters)
					BedLogUpdate = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					path = "Settings/BedLog/UpdateReservationProgram"
					parameters = {"programId": programId,
									"bedLogId": bedLogId,}
					ProgramUpdate = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshBedLogTable',{},'session')
					system.perspective.print(ExitDestinationId)
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("BedLog entry updated successfully.")
				else:
					system.perspective.print(sameParticipant_multiDate.getValueAt(0,'id'))
					system.perspective.print(eventStart)
					system.perspective.print(eventEnd)
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage('participant is checked into another Bed for selected start and end date')
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage('Bed is occupied for selected start and end date')
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage('Checkout date can not be prior to check-in date')
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("BedLog Settings Update Button")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

pass

#	self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("BedLog entry deleted successfully.")

#		path = "Settings/BedLog/DeleteBedLogEntry"

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here

	self.showMessage(payload['message'])
